statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); total_in=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.total_input_tokens'); total_out=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.total_output_tokens'); session_id=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.session_id'); session_file="/tmp/claude-session-${session_id}"; current_time=$(date +%s); if [ ! -f "$session_file" ]; then echo "$current_time" > "$session_file"; start_time=$current_time; else start_time=$(cat "$session_file"); fi; elapsed=$((current_time - start_time)); hours=$((elapsed / 3600)); minutes=$(((elapsed % 3600) / 60)); seconds=$((elapsed % 60)); if [ $hours -gt 0 ]; then time_str=$(printf '%dh%dm' "$hours" "$minutes"); elif [ $minutes -gt 0 ]; then time_str=$(printf '%dm%ds' "$minutes" "$seconds"); else time_str=$(printf '%ds' "$seconds"); fi; context_info=""; if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); context_info=$(printf '%d%%' "$pct"); fi; cost=""; if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then input_cost=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.4f\", ($total_in * 3.0 / 1000000)}"); output_cost=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.4f\", ($total_out * 15.0 / 1000000)}"); session_cost=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.2f\", $input_cost + $output_cost}"); cost=$(printf '$%.2f' "$session_cost"); fi; tokens=""; if [ "$total_in" != "null" ] && [ "$total_out" != "null" ] && [ $total_in -gt 0 ]; then in_k=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.0f\", $total_in / 1000}"); out_k=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.0f\", $total_out / 1000}"); tokens=$(printf '%dk/%dk' "$in_k" "$out_k"); fi; status="$model"; [ -n "$time_str" ] && status="$status | $time_str"; [ -n "$tokens" ] && status="$status | tok: $tokens"; [ -n "$context_info" ] && status="$status | ctx: $context_info"; [ -n "$cost" ] && status="$status | $cost"; echo "$status"
